Html:
Thanks for the great app..

I am new to MVC and I was trying to set up KiGG in my Vista Home premium machine.. I have latest MVC framework and IIS 7 installed in my machine and I followed all the instructions in the Readme file of KiGG.

When I try to browse the site as IIS 7 web application ( http://localhost/KiGG )am getting following error

Server Error in '/KiGG' Application.
Compilation Error
Description: An error occurred during the compilation of a resource required to service this request. Please review the following specific error details and modify your source code appropriately.

Compiler Error Message: CS0016: Could not write to output file 'c:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727\Temporary ASP.NET Files\kigg\0b3dddd8\cabba8b0\App_global.asax.ki7g7wcn.dll' -- 'Access is denied. '

Source Error:

[No relevant source lines]
Source File:    Line: 0

can anyone please help me?

I have given full access for NETWORK SERVICE user account to the folder c:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727\Temporary ASP.NET Files\

and now its working fine...
